about_the_game:
Sanator: Elmo's Legacy is a branching visual novel that follows the adventures of a certain plague doctor. What secrets do the Ailur people hold, and who St. Elmo really was? Venture into the heart of the frozen Taiga and find the answers.

This story takes place after "The Scarlet Scarf", and we follow Richard as he goes on an expedition to lake Tanaer. Ailur, ancient artifacts, and a conspiracy inside the Brotherhood—all of that awaits you in the game slated for release no earlier than 2023.

WHO ARE YOU, BROTHER?..

⠀
  • You are the healer of plagues
Your first recollection is a flock of crows looking down at you. You were nurtured within the walls of Kerneberg, to serve as a healer of plagues. With Tentaria as your mother and Elm as your father, all good people from the frozen taiga to the shining Milky Mountains will call you Brother.

  • You are the beastslayer
Нere, children draw symbols around their beds so they won't be dragged away at night, and mothers wish for them to sleep lightly rather than soundly. Every day is an endless battle, but death is not the worst possibility for the loser. Who knows whether or not you'll return after leaving home? And if you do, will you be the same?

  • You are the shield of the weak
This world has fallen twice, and its future is happening on the ruins of a forgotten past. Technology has become like magic, and the mundane is considered a miracle. On the ashes of megacities, new powers rise with only one goal: to discover how much they've lost.
Нere, everyone is looking for answers, but they only find new questions. And the lucky few who still gain knowledge…

You wouldn't want to be in their shoes.

KEY FEATURES:

⠀
  • Authentic, hand-crafted atmosphere. Loads of carefully drawn art.
  • 13 enchanting musical compositions, created exclusively for the game.
  • With the fate of the Sanator in your hands, experience four unique endings.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content.
